content: Hi all! I'm Irene Knapp, a former Google SWE specialized in privacy, a labor organizer, and an activist around trans, mental health, and disability issues. (If you see me use "we" to refer to myself sometimes, it's for reasons described at https://pluralpride.com.) I'm new to Rust but excited about it. I joined the chat because a friend let me know about the FFI-unwind working group, which I'm excited to be part of because of my experience with FFI issues in other languages. Glad to meet you all!
Welcome @Irene Knapp! Nice to meet you. I hope you enjoy it here :)
